website_summaries.verdict: This smooth waterproof eyeliner is gentle on sensitive eyes, making it ideal for contact wearers.
pros: Fine felt tip produces precise lines
Glides on smooth and dries in seconds
Stays in place all day, even in the pool
Wipes off painlessly with a little makeup remover
cons: Has a shiny finish that doesn't appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has larger eyes, who wears very big eyeliner and has tried everything, I LOVE this product. I have been using it for years; It does not budge at all. You could easily wear this for 12+ hours. It is also not difficult to remove considering it is water proof; it balls up like latex and has a glossy finish. Does not transfer onto my oily eyelids or get anywhere under my eyes. Perfect eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: L'oreal usually doesn't tend to disappoint when it comes to the quality of their products but this product is an exception. Not only does it easily leak into the eyes, it flakes not long after wear. Because the product has such a difficult application, it gets into eyelashes as well. One time it felt as if my eyelashes were glued together; I couldn't even remove it without losing some lashes.
customer_reviews.author: User.3953

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ It but it’s a shiney finish.
customer_reviews.text: This liner is definitely waterproof!! The felt tip is beautifully pointy and saturated with product. The only reason it didn’t get 5 stars from me is because after it dries, it’s shiny. There may be plenty of people who don’t mind that look, but for those of you like myself, beware!! If that doesn’t bother you, look no further...you found your liner for life.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this product it comes out matte and not shiny, lasts all day, is fairly easy to apply, also isn’t a pain in the ass to remove either. I do not like buying it from Amazon any more. For whatever reason the last one I bought seemed really old. Did not apply well the first time or ANY time after. Not sure if it was because it was summer and particularly hot or just a bad batch. Been using this stuff for years though.
customer_reviews.author: pantara whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner, flight attendant approved for 12 hour flights
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner and have been going back to this for over a year now! I used to use the Dior pen eyeliner and the Stila one, but the pens dry up quickly and are hard to wing out, but this liner is much more flexible than the felt tip pens. Also, it stays on all day. I am a flight attendant and I fly long haul international and this stays on for over 10 hour flights. I even use this when I swim at the beach on my layovers :-) please don’t ever discontinue this product!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend if you have monolids/oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I need liquid waterproof eyeliner for my monolids since the pens usually don’t work well for me. This one amazed me after one swipe on my eyelids. It was super pigmented and dried quickly but by the middle of the day, it “cracked” and my eyeliner didn’t look the same as it did when I first put it on in the morning. I got home and the eyeliner got smudged everywhere. Wouldn’t recommend this if you have oily skin and monolids. Seems like it works for everyone else except me. (Excuse my awk pic)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite liquid eyeliner. Hands down. It lasts all day and the application process is relatively easy and clean, doesn't smudge and can be quickly removed with water. My winged eyeliner is a staple, every day look and people always ask me about my liner. The only thing I don't like is the top, I purchased the liquid eyeliner twice and each time, it broke, causing the eyeliner to dry out sooner than if should.
customer_reviews.author: Sonyi

customer_reviews.title: Another terrible eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Smudges, runs, and is hard as hell to apply. DO NOT BUY. In my opinion, of course, which we all know is relative :), but if I can save one customer from wasting their money on this like I did, then it's of value.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Great Liner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this liner for years. It’s perfect each time I apply it. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with brush
customer_reviews.text: My brush end wasn’t pointy like how I needed it to be. I’ve ordered many different brands of liquid eyeliner and one thing I can’t stand is a round or defective brush end. It makes my wings harder to do. Not satisfied but I don’t know if maybe it was just mine that may have been messed up
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for all-day wear
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands (stilla, sephora, este lauder, kat von d, etc.) and this is still my favorite liquid eyeliner, and at a fraction of the cost of the others. It is highly pigmented, and stays on great. I have never felt the need to reapply throughout the day, and it looks nearly as good at the end of the day as it does when I first put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Maybe Bulletproof
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST eyeliner I've ever used. Like others have stated, once dry it has the consistency of latex and can actually be peeled off half the time. But this stuff does NOT move. You could go swimming with it, hang out all day at the beach, and as long as you don't vigorously rub your eyes, it STAYS PUT. In case you're now worried, it does come off with makeup remover. Just use gentle circular motions and it will come right off. Unfortunately I literally can't find it anywhere anymore. Target, Rite Aid, Walgreens etc. Thank God for Amazon 😍 PS Don't test my theory that it's bulletproof, please. I just wouldn't be surprised if it was.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Poirot

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, I work 12 to 16 hour days in a hot kitchen. At the end of the day I still have eyeliner on my face. It stays on until I remove it with I make up remover. Definitely holds up to a long day. I’ll never buy anything else ever again!
customer_reviews.author: MelodyLee

customer_reviews.title: Very black
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dark gray and this is very black. But other than the color not being what I was looking for, the product seems to be pretty good. It is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Don't use if you want sharp wings!
customer_reviews.text: the applicator tends pulls on my skin and doesn't apply evenly...it's not painful or anything, it just doesn't create a smooth line or a sharp edge. It seems to be a foam tip, not a brush, which makes a really sharp wing impossible. It does stay on, so I guess it works all right, but I was still really disappointed. I'll use it until it runs out, but I definitely won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: ditaylor13

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner -- most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I get this product on auto-delivery every month and most of the time it is fantastic! I use it every day and the felt, pointed makes it easy to apply a thin or thick line. However, every once in awhile, I get one that can't even make it a month and I am not using eyeliner in an overly heavy interesting way. When that happens, it doesn't matter how many layers you might apply, it remains thin and a little see-through. Still, I stick with it because I find it easy to apply and the black is a good color.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Thomson

customer_reviews.title: I will stick with my Loreal eyeliner that is not water proof.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product at all. It flakes and ends up with flakes in my eyes, and what does stay on seems to be so hard to get off that my lashes are suffering. Wish I hadn't bought. I will stick with my Loreal eyeliner that is not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: jvanarck

customer_reviews.title: Precision lining possible.
customer_reviews.text: I love the hair it has to apply the fluid. Can make a precision line. I wish I would've gotten the brown/black...instead of the black. I love either way. My make-up remover cloths removes the eye liner in a few swipes. Stays on for a long time but can be wiped off in no time. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: devil woman

customer_reviews.title: I love how it glides on
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in black. I love how it glides on. When I apply this I immediately blend it with a fine brush, this dries fast. I give this a 4 because at the end of the day the liner has clumped up leaving small dots of liner that I have to remove otherwise my eyes have visible small black dots. Good for an 8 to 10hour day but after that time frame I remove using makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Most functional eyeliner for all day
customer_reviews.text: I like waterproof eyeliners that sort of peel off rather than melt off or only come off with makeup removers. I put my makeup on for work and I go to the gym after, and the eyeliner is still exactly as I applied it even after a 5 mile run and a lot of sweating. I've always loved this eyeliner but for some reason a lot of stores like Target and Walgreens don't carry it anymore so I now have to order it online.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this eyeliner. I have oily lids and my eyes crinkle when I laugh or smile, so every other eyeliner I’ve tried usually leaves me looking like a raccoon. I like that this flakes off (only when you rub it with eye makeup remover or if you’ve been wearing it for 16+ hours) because it doesn’t smudge and ruin the rest of your face. The closest dupe I’ve used is Kat Von D tattoo liner, but that’s pricey and it still smudges. This is my ride or die!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Monta

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than you'd think, great color, makes my eyes pop!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Easy to use, reasonable price and lasts all day. I am blonde and fair skinned, but I still get the darker black because I like the way it makes my eye make up pop. Perfect to use if interested in doing a cat eye, or even for a lighter eye liner day. Great great great.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Perkins

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty well. Definitely water proof because I was in the rain for 3 hours and it didn't smear or run. Although it's definitely not an all day product rain or not after a long day it gets weird. It's almost like it gets crusty and starts peeling. It just looks really unattractive after a while and also leaves an awful residue if you get it on your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent liquid eyeliner. I have very watery eyes and have had no issues with this eyeliner running. It does stay on all day (through naps) with no smudging and I have very oily skin. 1 Star off because this does dry with some shine, it’s not matte which I prefer. No flaking and the felt tip applicator is stiff enough to get sharp lines, but flexible enough to where it doesn’t hurt to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Rem P.

customer_reviews.title: A must if wanting a Eyeliner while swimming
customer_reviews.text: I really like this I bought this because we were going on vacation and I wanted something to wear when I went In the ocean. stayed on didn’t smear smudge or come off while laying out and getting into the water really a nice eyeliner it has a flexible felt tip which is really nice
customer_reviews.author: mom2jav

customer_reviews.title: Bomb AF!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this eye liner for 8 years. It stays in place and doesn’t smudge- and I have it on repeat every month because that’s about how quick I go through it. I’ve tried all kinds of high end make up ( mostly everything else is) and I can’t get away from this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Nicole Stylez

customer_reviews.title: Not for active women or for those who need waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Once applied, you have a hour or so before it starts to pop off of your lid in pieces. Comes off clean with no residue if rubbed off right then, but if you use a remover at that point, expect it to be a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Cooping247

customer_reviews.title: Fav waterproof liquid liner.
customer_reviews.text: If you want it all day product with her Syse line, this is for you. I have been using this for years. I have tried several other from high and to drugstore. This is my fac if you want it all day product with her size line, this is for you. I have been using this for years. I have tried several other from high-end to drugstore. This is my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute go-to eyeliner. If a store doesn't carry it, then I order it from online. I refuse to use any other eyeliner. The waterproof feature of this eyeliner makes it strong and long lasting, I apply it early in the morning and don't ever have to touch it up throughout the day. I use this eyeliner to do cat-eye or winged eyeliner and it is by far the easiest application wise for getting perfect and even cat-eyes every time. I recommend this product to anyone who wants to use liquid eyeliner on their upper eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: katvance

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My go to eyeliner for many years now. It really does what it’s supposed to. Happy with the price of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: krlcrdv

customer_reviews.title: High pigment and durability
customer_reviews.text: Wings on fleek!!!! I was pleasantly surprised how good of quality this eyeliner was for the price. I’ve tried so many different liquid eyeliners, even super expensive ones and this has been one of the best that I’ve used in a long time. Lasted all day and didn’t smudge at all even when I cried.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Ann

customer_reviews.title: Flakes off into your eyes..
customer_reviews.text: No good after couple hours of wear it flacks big chunks in your eye. I apply on the outer side of eye not the inner. It would be much worse if you apply in the inner. product did come on time..
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not smudge or waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product but isn’t waterproof or long lasting it applies nicely and the tip is nice for applying it
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Craven

customer_reviews.title: Good for those with oily faces!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty oily face and eyeliner would constantly smear or imprint itself below my lower lashes, but I don't have that problem with this eyeliner! Absolutely love it, but it does have a few cons, it sort of flakes off as the day goes by, but not enough that your eyeliner looks any different. If you try to wipe off part of your eyeliner to redraw it, it'll peel off other bits of the eyeliner with it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this product. You have to be careful applying. I tried drawing my wing but it kept coming out too thick. I do like that it goes on smoothly and then dries to stay on but when its being applied it's a bit too watery. Drawing from my inner corner of my eye to the outer corner was a big no no! The liquid seeped right into my eyes and I had to rinse my eyes right away because it burned like hell. That's what the lack of two stars are for. I really want to like this product but it's too thick and watery during application. Once it dries it looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Escribano

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before from the store, was happy to find online, however, this item is like tinted water. It smears and doesn't stay on well, or even glide on well. I don't know why or what is wrong with it but I'm not happy knowing that the same product was fine purchased in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ciardi

customer_reviews.title: Tightlining at its best
customer_reviews.text: I have used every pencil that has remotely good reviews, This is the bomb for the wetline.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pearce Data Inc

customer_reviews.title: ITS DURABLE LADIES
customer_reviews.text: This has been my eye liner for ten years basically. It looks flawless after being in the pool, sweating your buns off and 8+ hr days. You really don’t need to spend $ on the Sephora eyeliners. Other makeup from Sephora like foundation is a definite. This however, it’s a cult favorite. Winged eyeliner is my favorite look
customer_reviews.author: Haley C.

customer_reviews.title: Stays put all day
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner stays on all day long. I have one eyelid that droops and hits my eyelid where the liner is. This means my eyeliner always smudges comes off on this eye. This is the only eyeliner that I have come across that does not smudge or come off that eye. For an inexpensive product it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: My New Fave!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't exactly call it waterproof.. which I actually love! I know it sounds crazy haha but it makes it removing it so easy. It is waterproof to an extent. Its not a pain in the butt removing it but it doesn't just wash away with a splash.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R.

customer_reviews.title: Cracks immediately
customer_reviews.text: I got this eye liner for my girlfriend and within 5 minutes of her putting it on, it had already cracked. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cash

customer_reviews.title: I love the pointed-tip
customer_reviews.text: Dark, waterproof, as expected. I love the pointed-tip, spongey applicator. Should you mess up, it comes off easily with a dab of a wet wipe. Stays on through the night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner. I've tried all sorts of fancy, expensive eyeliners but they all smear and fade throughout the day and I usually end up with dark circles under my eyes. This one dries almost like a gel and I sort of peel it off at the end of the day. There's no smearing and no need for makeup remover. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ganesh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is great eye liner. Seriously there is nothing better. The waterproof stays on for 2 days if you want it to. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Great liner
customer_reviews.text: This is my eyeliner of choice. I've been using it for over a year, and I find the applicator is easy to use. It's really waterproof -- last summer I wore it into a swimming pool and it came out perfectly. My only criticism is that sometimes the liquid liner coagulates a little around the top of the bottle, and you've got to wipe it off the wand with a tissue. The color is a great jet black though and I love to use this with mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mey

customer_reviews.title: Dark, smooth eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The brush always ends up breaking on me after a few weeks, but I do love how smoothly the eyeliner goes on .... so still my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey claxton

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to create sharp lines with this. I’m not crazy for the formula because it doesn’t seem to last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Young

customer_reviews.title: Best Stay in place waterproof eyeliner on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waterproof eyeliner on the market. It goes on kind a like eyelash glue so it does not smudge off when it comes off. It peels off in a strip. If you wear lashes yes it does also give you a reinforcement to hold them on . Good price from seller! An can scribe Monthy .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Roberts

customer_reviews.title: BEST Eyeliner Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love this eyeliner! It's like not other, I have tried several different types of eyeliners in order to throw them away. They do not compete with the felt tip of L'Oreal Paris Telescopic Precision Liquid tip. This one is just right to get your line across your eye at the perfect fit. I will always continue to bust this product.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Kind of chalky consultancy. Not sure if its drying out or if it has to do with being waterproof. It doea stay in pretty well though, and I swear a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kia M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: You have to hurry when applying if you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to hurry when applying if you need to make adjustments as this dries quickly and it is waterproof. I actually got this because I see a chiropractor often and would always leave a make up mess on the exam table paper. Now I don't have that problem anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Deevers

customer_reviews.title: No raccoon eyes!
customer_reviews.text: The only eyeliner that doesn’t give me raccoon eye! I’ve been stuck on this one for years.
customer_reviews.author: S403P

customer_reviews.title: I am much happier with L’Oréal gel eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: To be waterproof this eyeliner really does not stay on that well! I am much happier with L’Oréal gel eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: budgetista

customer_reviews.title: Applicator is very hard to use. Can’t get a smooth line.
customer_reviews.text: Applicator is very hard to use, you can’t get a smooth line. It drags on the lid. I ordered charcoal, but the color is almost black. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Best liner EVER!!️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this liner, it's now my FAVORITE!!️ I use it on the water line and not on the lid, so water resistance is ALWAYS an issue, till now. The telescopic felt tip is GREAT, I can go as thin as I want, or thick. It's so much better than I was expecting!! Love love 💘 😻 💜 💛 💚
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I can actually use this!
customer_reviews.text: I am really bad at using liquid liner. But this really helps. It seems to dry really fast so I don't have to worry about blinking and getting it all over the place. And the applicator shape is perfect! My only concern is that I have to re-apply in throughout the day. I've never had to do that with other liquid liners. But its a trade off for something I can use more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kytti

customer_reviews.title: Survived Disney.
customer_reviews.text: Survived a day that began at 4am, a flight, and a 90-degree (or more) day in Disney World that ended at around 11pm with very minimal flaking. On days I was awake a normal amount of hours, rather than nearly 24 hours, it didn't flake a bit.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  First liquid eyeliner that doesn't smudge with oily skin
customer_reviews.text: OK the stuff is amazing and I'll need to buy more! I have never been able to find a liquid eyeliner that doesn't smudge with having oily skin, they always would smudge to my upper eyelid. This stuff hasn't budged all day!!
customer_reviews.author: Montana05

customer_reviews.title: Must reapply
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not smudge or waterproof. I usually buy the regular not waterproof & it lasts much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly crowe

customer_reviews.title: The applicator is the best. Not too thick and gives a tight line
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is the best. Not too thick and gives a tight line. The liner liquid is also pretty good, it doesn't get flakey and can be corrected easily with a qtip durring application. My favorite in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Sassinator4Life

customer_reviews.title: I bought this eyeliner because my friend raved about it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyeliner because my friend raved about it.... However, I ended up tossing it after using it once. It takes a long time to dry, and then became flaky, all over around my eyes... maybe it works for some people, not me...
customer_reviews.author: J. Xu

customer_reviews.title: I have super oily skin and other eyeliners smudge on my upper ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the only eyeliner that stays on all day!! I have super oily skin and other eyeliners smudge on my upper lid. This one stays put! Even when I'm swimming! You do need to remove it with eye makeup remover for waterproof makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunner
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to eyeliner and I’ve used it for 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Christians

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this eyeliner everyday and it lasts pretty much the whole day and doesn’t smear. The brush is easy to use bc it’s solid and short. The formula is a bit thin so you need to put a couple layers on to make sure it’s dark.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner, it doesnt move at all, the only downside is that it is harder to take off than other eyeliners
customer_reviews.author: EmReviews

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't dark enough for me and seemed watery. Goes ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't dark enough for me and seemed watery. Goes on a bit streaky. To get a solid line you have to make very short strokes and keep dipping the applicator for more product. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Really smudgeproof!
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely does not smudge! It sort of forms a strip that will peel off easily when washed, however it stays on great throughout the day. I have deep set eyes and have always had trouble with smudging. Although I have tried some pretty good eyeliners, none work as well as this one. I will keep using it as long as they continue to make it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner i ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I have ever used. It stays on and doesn't just wipe off or smear. Doesn't clump in pieces like most latex waterproof eyeliners do. This stayed on for me all day and didn't clump in my eyelashes like some do. I love this product and will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Candace smith

customer_reviews.title: A total flake
customer_reviews.text: Pigmented. Easy enough to apply. Once it dries, it immediately begins to flake off. Doesn't matter if I've applied it to bare skin, eyeshadow primer, concealer, or any finish of eyeshadow. It flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like these eye liner, have been trying different ones since Avon cancel the long lasting water prof eye liner, and I used some from MaryKay but too expensive. so I really like these one and is really good last me all day and is really dark the texture when is dry is like latex so is easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works well, lasts all day. Only problem I had was the light reflects onto them making it shiny instead of matte
customer_reviews.author: Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winged eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my Dash Button and Subscribe and Save. The tip is designed well and easy to draw a cat eye. It stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: N. Green

customer_reviews.title: No disappointed at all
customer_reviews.text: Fave! Used to buy them at the department store but was Priming and saw they had them for the same price. Didn’t need right away so I purchased and waited the two days. No disappointed at all. Good formula that make lines black, not light black where you have to go over it 2-3 time. Shopped on time with damage!
customer_reviews.author: Thailand Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Flakes off
customer_reviews.text: I applied this and within an hour it had started to flake and peel off. I could see it falling off my eyelid in my peripheral vision.
customer_reviews.author: Jean1607

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Goes on smoothly and maintains a rich color. Stays on all day and lasted during pool swims.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Cry away, eyeliner will stay!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this product but it’s getting harder to find in retail stores. I guess people don’t get the greatness of waterproof eyeliner. Watery allergy eyes... no problem, sad movie... no problem, day of floating a river on a tube.... no problem. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It's not advertised as waterproof, but it stays put all day - even through a sweaty workout.
customer_reviews.author: stareditor

customer_reviews.title: I have oily skin and this eye liner works great and the felt tip gives me a nice pointed ...
customer_reviews.text: Very waterproof, never smudges. I have oily skin and this eye liner works great and the felt tip gives me a nice pointed wing.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This is not waterproof like they claim it to be and it comes off very easily. Peels and looks very glossy after its dried.
customer_reviews.author: GENNIE

customer_reviews.title: Really waterproof and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love those eyeliner. It is really waterproof and never budges on your eyes. It is, however, hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only eyeliner I have found that will not smudge with my extremely hooded eyes!!! I love it so so much! I used it so much in high school and for the longest time couldn’t find it. Then found it herebone day and I was happier than a kid in a candy store!!! Because I’ve tried so many “smudge proofs/waterproof” liners it’s not even funny...
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Flawless cat eye everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I've ever used! The flexible felt tip is great and I like that I don't have to do several coats to get a streamlined, effortless cat eye look. It's easy to use and it stays on ALL DAY. I've been buying this brand over three years now and it always outshines other liquid eyeliners in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: happysnappy

customer_reviews.title: Waste!
customer_reviews.text: This liner is FAR from waterproof. God forbid it rains! It will flake off. It really is terrible. The MAN waterproof liquid eyeliner is way better and actually does what it says it will. I will never waste my money on this again and I urge you not too.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: I hate meeting with people and worrying that there's going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof! I will put it on in the morning and then about 2 hours into my day I have these little black flacks getting into my eye and around my eyes. I hate meeting with people and worrying that there's going to be a bunch of black specs around my eyes or getting under my contacts. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite eyeliners! Perfect for a bold eyeliner line
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite eyeliners! Perfect for a bold eyeliner line. Doesn't smudge or fade all day. Snow and rain, gym time, do not wreck it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: ... the hydrafuge hurts my eyes this one works really good nice defined tip for easy application loreal us the
customer_reviews.text: The waterproof one glides on smoother but I had to get this one because the hydrafuge hurts my eyes this one works really good nice defined tip for easy application loreal us the best
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Needs Thinner Brush
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof liquid eyeliner works great but do not like the brush. Brush is to thick it should be a lot thinner, thank god I had a brush that was thinner from another L'Oreal liquid eyeliner which is not waterproof so I am using that one.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Herman

customer_reviews.title: but overall its a good eyeliner. It does dry shiny though
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a chance to test if its waterproof, but overall its a good eyeliner. It does dry shiny though. The felt tip is good to use for thin or thick lines depending on your preference. After some hours, it does tend to flake on the ends of my eye.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid liner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best liquid liner I've ever used. It's black, it stays in place, it applies well and precisely, and it's easy to remove. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Lasts. Thick.
customer_reviews.text: Truly lasts a long time and stays on through water. Actually, probably too much for me. I like to be able to remove my makeup at the end of the day and sometimes this resists even the best makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: CNay

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, glides on easy and no clumps. it last all day until you take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best liquid eyeliners I have used. Easy to apply and long lasting. I put it on on the morning, wore it throughout the day and night, fell asleep and it was still on and looking good the next day. Love the rich color too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: Buy at CVS, you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically buy my make up at the drug stores, but i always this same eyeliner at CVS and it’s great! The cone-brush doesn’t flare out and it stays all day! Great cheap product. The amazon version flakes off from a tiny touch. Would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: TK 14

customer_reviews.title: My favorite liquid eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this eyeliner for years and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for an easy liquid liner. It's easliy removable yet it doesn't smear or streak when it gets wet. I will use this till they stop making it, which I hope they never do.
customer_reviews.author: sandra bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best liquid eyeliner around!! Been using it for years and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Y

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I was looking for a waterproof eyeliner with a felt tip. I am on the hunt for a product that can withstand summer activities like snorkeling, theme parks etc. My eyes always water on roller coaster rides and it messes with my gorgeous wings. This product is okay but when you splash your face/eyes with water there s still a little transfer of product to the under eye area. The product is a little flaky as well. If you went your finger sna touch the liner, it will crackle and come right off. I will continue to try other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy, and isn't difficult to remove. Only issue is that eyeshadow often gets smudged on top and covers it up easily, but the eyeliner itself doesn't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous!
customer_reviews.text: Horrendous! This liner smeared and creased (all over my lids) after less than four hours, working in an office in 70 degree, non-humid conditions. It was a pain in the arse to apply, and then it smeared, leaving me with panda eyes at work. Ugggh! If you buy this liner, do yourself a favour and don't look in the mirror until you get home-- because there is no saving the disaster it leaves on your eyelids!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Marie Gaudioso

customer_reviews.title: Good liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: A good liquid eyeliner. I like the charcoal color, its a tiny bit softer than black.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clumps a lot when it gets wet Clumps a lot when applied Definitely not buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Telescopic Precision Liquid Waterproof Eyeliner, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Waterproof BlackGive your eyes dramatic definition that lasts all day. L’Oral Paris presents Telescopic Waterproof Precision Liquid Eyeliner, the perfect companion to Telescopic Mascara for a precisely defined and intense eye look. The winged eyeliner is perfect for the most accurate application. Use this waterproof eyeliner for eye makeup that lasts up to 16-hour wear. • Smudge proof liquid eyeliner • All day wear • Waterproof eyeliner • Rich, intense colored eye makeup Application tip: shake well before each use. Glide tip along the outer lash line, pressing lightly for a thin line and increasing pressure for a thicker line. Replace tip in ink well to remoisten if desired. Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetic eye applicators can lead to eye damage, and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.

BRAND STORY
By L'Oreal Paris
feature_bullets: L'OREAL WATERPROOF LIQUID EYELINER: The Telescopic Precision Liquid Eyeliner, with slanted felt tip, is angled to allow you to quickly draw the most accurate line. Suitable for sensitive eyes & contact lens wearers.
L'OREAL EYELINER: Use our best eyeliners to achieve an everyday eye look or a bold cat eye look. Choose from a variety ranging from gel to liquid felt tip eyeliners & pencil eye liners.

CREATE YOUR PERFECT EYE MAKEUP LOOK with our collection of mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge-proof eyeliner, add definition to your brows & discover eyeshadow palettes with shades made for every eye color.

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oréal Paris helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks & much more.
COMPLETE THE LOOK: Telescopic Precision Liquid Eyeliner is the perfect companion to Telescopic Mascara for a precisely defined & intense eye look.
